entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog at times early this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
